overview: Crisscrossing the country inside an old school bus that's been converted into a mobile film studio, members of the Los Angeles Film Cooperative set out from California to capture the lesser-seen side of American life in this documentary. Along the way, they rub elbows with ordinary citizens and celebrities alike, including Oscar-winning director Oliver Stone, underground hip-hop act Dead Prez and guerilla poster artist Robbie Conal.
title: Behind the Wheel
